quote: A man will seek to express his relation to the stars; but when a man's consciousness has been riveted upon obtaining a loaf of bread, that loaf of bread is as important as the stars.
quote_letters: A MAN WILL SEEK TO EXPRESS HIS RELATION TO THE STARS BUT WHEN A MANS CONSCIOUSNESS HAS BEEN RIVETED UPON OBTAINING A LOAF OF BREAD THAT LOAF OF BREAD IS AS IMPORTANT AS THE STARS
